Media player

Media player

Display video content with an automatic transcript.

On this page
  • Visual design
  • Guidelines for use
  • Layouts
  • Examples and assets

Visual design

Design view:

Mobile design

Desktop designs can be viewed on screens wider than 650px.

Video title

Time: 01:02

A short description promoting the video can be placed here.

    opacity: 1.0;
}

Guidelines for use

Purpose:

The media player component displays video in a content page with the ability to play and pause. It includes a title, optional description and a transcript that displays in time with the video. 

When to use this component:

  • We use video as secondary information to reinforce the message on a content page.
  • On customer story pages, video may be used as the primary content without page body content.

Content rules

  • On 101 or tutorial pages, provide lead in content above the video.
  • When embedding video, insert only the YouTube ID (not the full URL) for the transcript to play correctly (e.g. NPBAdEfO9h0, rather than https://youtu.be/NPBAdEfO9h0>
  • YouTube transcripts must be UK English to play on our site.

Layouts

Page width

The media player is used in two-third width pages.

Component layout options

Full width layout

Desktop, Tablet & Mobile: One component in a row.
